title: Grilled Chicken
procedure: Marinate chicken with olive oil, garlic, salt, pepper, and herbs for 15–20 minutes.
Preheat grill or oven to medium-high heat.
Place the chicken on the grill and cook for 6–8 minutes on each side until fully cooked.
Check the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
Remove from grill and let it rest for 5 minutes.
Serve hot with vegetables or rice.

title: Spaghetti Bolognese
procedure: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions and drain.
Heat olive oil in a pan, sauté onions and garlic until golden.
Add minced meat and cook until browned.
Pour in tomato sauce and simmer for 15–20 minutes.
Season with salt, pepper, and Italian herbs.
Serve spaghetti topped with the Bolognese sauce and grated cheese.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
procedure: Chop vegetables like broccoli, carrots, bell peppers, and snow peas.
Heat oil in a wok or pan and sauté garlic and ginger for 1 minute.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5–7 minutes.
Add soy sauce, a pinch of sugar, and stir well.
Cook until vegetables are tender but still crisp.
Serve hot with steamed rice or noodles.

title: Paneer Butter Masala
procedure: Cube paneer and lightly fry until golden brown.
In a pan, heat butter and sauté onions and garlic until soft.
Add tomato puree, spices (garam masala, turmeric, chili powder) and cook for 5–7 minutes.
Add cream and mix well to form a rich gravy.
Add fried paneer cubes and simmer for 5 minutes.
Garnish with coriander and serve with naan or rice.

title: Grilled Fish
procedure: Marinate fish fillets with lemon juice, salt, pepper, and herbs for 10–15 minutes.
Preheat grill or oven to medium-high heat.
Grill fish for 5–7 minutes on each side until cooked through.
Remove from heat and drizzle with extra lemon juice.
Serve hot with a side salad or steamed vegetables.
